column4: When using virtualbox in (win7) and booting a session of Ubuntu, can i specify somewhere that i only need terminal and not Desktop ?
: in grub remove "splash" from kernel line

: after bios screen...grub screen appears (you should press and hold "Shift" key....while bios screen appears) after getting this black screen....press e to edit grub mean..Search for "kerlel" and in the same line somewhere you will find "splash" ..remove this "splash" and press crtl+x
